title: MADRS-Modular Asynchronous Distributed Retail System
description: Developed using Django 5, PostgreSQL, Redis, Celery, RabbitMQ, and Stripe.
Implemented user auth, product search, shopping cart, and payment flow.
Asynchronous order handling using Celery task queues and Redis cache.
Fully Dockerized and deployed on Azure with Nginx + Gunicorn setup.
Designed for scalability and high-availability in production environments.

title: ðŸ©º Lung Nodule Detection System using Deep Learning
description: Built a full 3D lung cancer detection pipeline using PyTorch.
CT scan preprocessing, 3D CNN-based classification, and U-Net segmentation.
Handled 220GB+ of scan data with chunked I/O and parallelism.
Deployed a real-time Gradio demo for end-to-end inference from sample scans.
